title: Ocean Salmon Program - Ricker Beam Trawl Juvenile Salmon Study from 1990 to 1993
abstract: During the period of 1990 to 1993, Robin J. LeBrasseur and N. Brent Hargreaves led a juvenile salmon migration research project off the west coast of Vancouver Island BC.  This included the development of surface beam trawl gear that could be deployed from a large trawl vessel (CCGS W.E. Ricker) and operated in an offshore environment.  This dataset contains the research survey catch data and individual fish examinations data.
